column1: Discuss techniques for detecting and mitigating AI model bias.
Explain how multi-modal learning integrates text, image, and audio data.
How do autoencoders enable dimensionality reduction?
Compare classification, regression, and clustering tasks in machine learning.
Explain how generative adversarial networks (GANs) work.
Describe how contrastive learning enables representation learning without labels.
How do decision trees differ from random forests?
Discuss the impact of feature scaling on model performance.
Explain how cross-validation helps prevent model overfitting.
Describe how ensemble methods improve model robustness.
